title: Uncle John
body: Whoa!  I just found out <a href="http://home.earthlink.net/imagelib/sitebuilder/misc/show_image.html?linkedwidth=300&linkpath=http://home.earthlink.net/~hardiboy/sitebuildercontent/sitebuilderpictures/gm.jpg&target=_self">Uncle John</a> has <a href="http://home.earthlink.net/~hardiboy/">his own site</a>.
